sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import * as actions from '../Actions/usuario'; import { Grid, Paper, TableContainer, table, TableHead, TableRow, TableCell, TableBody, withStyles, ButtonGroup, Button } from '@material-ui/core' import EditIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Edit"; import DeleteIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Delete"; const Usuarios = (props) => { useEffect(() => { props.fetchAllUsuarios() }, []) return( Usuario Senha { props.usuarioList.map((record, index) => { return ( {record.usuario} {record.senha} ) }) }
) } const mapStateToProps = state => ({ usuarioList: state.usuario.list }) const mapActionToProps = { fetchAllUsuarios: actions.fetchAll, deleteUsuario: actions.Delete } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapActionToProps)(Usuarios);
